translations: 衰弱的，虚弱的；（光线或声音）微弱的；软弱的；无效的，不佳的

sentences.sentence: The heartbeat was feeble and irregular.
Don't be so feeble! Tell her you don't want to go.
sentences.translation: 别那么软弱了！告诉她你不想去。

sentences.sentence: At last a feeble voice replied, "Thank you so much, dear Ratty!"
sentences.translation: 最后，一个微弱无力的声音回答道：“非常感谢你，亲爱的鼠仔！”
